Chris Shyi

Web Developer, MOOC Enthusiast

I am a web developer who mostly works on the back end. I am a strong believer in self-learning and have completed many online courses in computer science and programming on the Coursera platform. As a self-taught developer, I made a point of focusing on computer science fundamentals and have taken upper year algorithms and operating system courses from the ECE department at my university, the University of Toronto. Check out my side-projects below.
